EXTRACTED VALUE: To share my belief that God is far more into, and around, our daily lives than we realize. That His miracles are abundant are global and constant.
To help people to live a generational driven life. By seeing life through a generational perspective - every trial, test and even triumphs matter.
I have always felt that Christian poetry was a special call and a gift from the Holy Spirit which I was to use for the glory of God.
